00033 void OnOffNode::NotifyConstructionCompleted() {
00034         NS_LOG_INFO("notified the completion of OnOffNode");
00035         NS_ASSERT(this->GetNDevices() == 1);
00036         Base::NotifyConstructionCompleted();
00037         NS_ASSERT(this->GetNDevices() == 2);NS_LOG_INFO("installing on-off application on node " << this->GetId());
00038         ns3::OnOffHelper on_off_helper("ns3::UdpSocketFactory", ns3::Address(
00039                         ns3::InetSocketAddress(ns3::Ipv4Address("1.2.3.4"),
00040                                         PACKET_SINK_UDP_PORT)));
00041         on_off_helper.SetConstantRate(ns3::DataRate("500kb/s"));
00042         if (!this->startAtTheBeginning) {
00043                 on_off_helper.SetAttribute("StartTime", ns3::TimeValue(ns3::Time(
00044                                 std::numeric_limits<int64_t>::max())));
00045                 on_off_helper.SetAttribute("StopTime",
00046                                 ns3::TimeValue(ns3::Seconds(0.0)));
00047         }
00048         //on_off_helper.SetAttribute("Remote", ns3::AddressValue(
00049         //              ns3::InetSocketAddress(ns3::Ipv4Address("127.0.0.1"),
00050         //                              PACKET_SINK_UDP_PORT)));
00051         this->onOffApplication = on_off_helper.Install(this);
00052         NS_ASSERT(this->GetNDevices() == 2);
00053         NS_ASSERT(this->onOffApplication.GetN()==1);
00054 }
00055 
00056 void OnOffNode::startAt(ns3::Time start_seconds) {
00057         this->onOffApplication.Start(start_seconds);
00058 }//startOnOffApplication
00059 
00060 void OnOffNode::stopAt(ns3::Time stop_seconds) {
00061         this->onOffApplication.Stop(stop_seconds);
00062 }//stopOnOffApplication
00063 
00064 void OnOffNode::setRemote(ns3::Ptr<PacketSinkNode> ptr_remote) {
00065         this->onOffApplication.Get(0)->SetAttribute("Remote", ns3::AddressValue(
00066                         ns3::InetSocketAddress(ptr_remote->getCsmaNetDeviceAddress(),
00067                                         PACKET_SINK_UDP_PORT)));
00068 }
